nodes.text: The Ebenmal system was located in the Irnaj sector of the Mid Rim. The system contained the planetoid Ebenmal where a battle took place between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

Although the planetoid Ebenmal was mentioned in a databank entry for the video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II in 2010, the Ebenmal system was not mentioned until an update for the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion—an appendix provided to expand the reference book The Essential Atlas—was provided in 2011.
